taxon.author: (Villers, 1789)
taxon.distribution: Europe, Turkey, Caucasus, Russia (Europe to Far East), Turkmenistan, Japan

referenceObject.reference: Villers, C. de (1789). Caroli Linnaei entomologia, faunae Suecicae descriptionibus aucta; DD. Scopoli, Geoffroy, de Geer, Fabricii, Schrank, etc., speciebus vel in systemate non enumeratis, vel nuperrime detectis, vel speciebus Galliae australis locupletata, generum specierumque rariorum iconibus ornata. Tomus Quartus. Piestre et Delamolliere, Lugdunum (= Lyon), 556 pp., pl. 11.
